{{Lang|'''Mt. Kanna'''|ja=カンナ山}} is a subarea of [[Tsurumi Island]].

*[[Electro Cube]]
*[[Electro Seelie]]
*[[Thunder Sakura Bough]]

*{{Item|Fluorescent Fungus}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* The name may derive from the Ainu god of lightning and thunder {{Lang|Kanna-{{w|kamuy}}|ain=カンナカムィ|ain_lit=above-god}}, which is often depicted as a dragon.
